# Assumes the current file is a unittest file # Runs with the currently-focused method as the test name
method=$(${TM_RUBY:=ruby} -e " n = ENV['TM_LINE_NUMBER'].to_i
File.open(ENV['TM_FILEPATH']) do |f| f.read.split(\"\n\")[0...n].reverse.each do |line| if line =~ /^\s*def ([_a-z][_a-z0-9]*[\?!]?)/i print \$1 break end end end")
${TM_RUBY:=ruby} "$TM_FILEPATH" --name=$method
